entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:06 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4 except plus 1 along the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4 except plus 1 along the coast. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:06 PM ADT Tuesday 28 March 2023
